K06D0013_H0017:213a-17: sangs rgyas 'grub bya snyam du kun mkhyen yid byed na //
K06D0013_H0017:213a-18: mkhas pa tshul khrims pha rol phyin gnas rig par bya //
K06D0013_H0017:213a-19: gal te bskal pa bye bar dge ba'i las lam
K06D0013_H0017:213a-20: bcu; ;spyod kyang rang rgyal dgra bcom nyid la 'dod
K06D0013_H0017:213a-21: bskyed na // de tshe tshul khrims skyon byung tshul khrims nyams pa yin //
K06D0013_H0017:213a-22: sems bskyed de ni phas pham pas kyang shin tu lci //
K06D0013_H0017:213b-0: tshul @213b khrims srung zhing byang chub mchog tu yongs bsngo la //
K06D0013_H0017:213b-1: de yis rlom sems med cing bdag bstod mi byed la //
K06D0013_H0017:213b-2: nga yi 'du shes sems can 'du shes yongs su spangs //
K06D0013_H0017:213b-3: byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims pha rol phyin gnas brjod //
K06D0013_H0017:213b-4: gal te byang chub sems dpa' rgyal ba'i lam sbyod pa //
K06D0013_H0017:213b-5: sems can 'di dag khrims ldan 'di dag khrims 'chal zhes //
K06D0013_H0017:213b-6: sna tshogs 'du shes zhugs ba shin tu tshul khrims 'chal //
K06D0013_H0017:213b-7: tshul khrims nyams shing de la yongs dag tshul khrims med //
K06D0013_H0017:213b-8: gang la bdag gi 'du shes sems can 'du shes med //
K06D0013_H0017:213b-9: 'du shes 'dod chags bral la sdom min ga la
K06D0013_H0017:213b-10: yod; ;gang la sdom dang sdom pa ma yin rlom
K06D0013_H0017:213b-11: sems med // 'di ni tshul khrims sdom par rnam par 'dren pas gsungs //
K06D0013_H0017:213b-12: sems can dag pa gang zhig de ltar khrims ldan pa //
K06D0013_H0017:213b-13: sdug dang mi sdug kun la lta ba med pa yin //
K06D0013_H0017:213b-14: mgo dang rkang lag gtong zhing zhum pa'i sems kyang med //
K06D0013_H0017:213b-15: bdog pa thams cad gtong zhing rtag tu zhen pa med //
K06D0013_H0017:213b-16: chos rnams rang bzhin bdag med ya ma brlar shes nas //
K06D0013_H0017:213b-17: bdag gi sha yang gtong la zhum pa'i sems med na //
K06D0013_H0017:213b-18: de tshe phyi rol dngos po gtong ba smos ci dgos //
K06D0013_H0017:213b-19: gal te ser sna byed pa de ni gnas med do //
K06D0013_H0017:213b-20: bdag tu 'du shes dngos la bdag gir 'dzin pas chags //
K06D0013_H0017:213b-21: blun po rnams la gtong ba'i blo lta ga la yod //
K06D0013_H0017:213b-22: ser sna can ni yi dvags gnas su skye bar 'gyur //
K06D0013_H0017:213b-23: ci ste mir skyes na yang de tshe dbul por 'gyur //
K06D0013_H0017:214a-1: byang chub sems dpa' sems can dbul shes nas //
K06D0013_H0017:214a-2: gtong la mos par 'gyur zhing rtag tu lhug par gtong //
K06D0013_H0017:214a-3: gling bzhi legs par brgyan pa mchil ma'i thal ba 'dra //
K06D0013_H0017:214a-4: byin nas dga' bar 'gyur gyi gling thob de lta min //
K06D0013_H0017:214a-5: byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa gsal ba srid gsum gyi //
K06D0013_H0017:214a-6: sems can ji snyed de dag kun la sbyin pa 'di //
K06D0013_H0017:214a-7: byin par gyur cig snyam du sems nas sbyin gyur la //
K06D0013_H0017:214a-8: de yang 'gro ba'i don phyir byang chub mchog tu bsngo //
K06D0013_H0017:214a-9: sbyin pa byin nas dngos la gnas par byed pa med //
K06D0013_H0017:214a-10: de ni nam du'ang rnam par smin la re ba med //
K06D0013_H0017:214a-11: de ltar gtong ba mkhas pa thams cad gtong ba ste //
K06D0013_H0017:214a-12: chung ngu btang la mang po dpag tu med par 'gyur //
K06D0013_H0017:214a-13: srid pa gsum na sems can ma lus ji snyed pa //
K06D0013_H0017:214a-14: yongs su brtag pa bzung ste de dag thams cad kyis //
K06D0013_H0017:214a-15: 'jig rten mkhyen pa sangs rgyas dgra bcom rang rgyal la //
K06D0013_H0017:214a-16: bskal pa mtha' yas sbyin byin nyan thos legs tshol na //
K06D0013_H0017:214a-17: byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa thabs mkhas gang zhig gis //
K06D0013_H0017:214a-18: de dag bsod nams bya ba'i dngos la yi rang nas //
K06D0013_H0017:214a-19: sems can don du byang chub mchog rab yongs bsngo na //
K06D0013_H0017:214a-20: yongs su bsngo bas 'gro ba thams cad zil gyis gnon //
K06D0013_H0017:214a-21: nor bu 'ching bu'i phung po chen por gyur pa yang //
K06D0013_H0017:214a-22: rin chen bee d'urya gcig de kun zil gyis gnon //
K06D0013_H0017:214b-0: de bzhin 'gro kun sbyin pa'i @214b phung po rgya chen kun //
K06D0013_H0017:214b-1: rjes su yi rang byang chub sems dpas zil gyis gnon //
K06D0013_H0017:214b-2: gal te byang chub sems dpas 'gro la sbyin byin nas //
K06D0013_H0017:214b-3: de la bdag gir mi byed dngos po phangs med na //
K06D0013_H0017:214b-4: de bas dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen 'phel 'gyur te //
K06D0013_H0017:214b-5: sprin med 'od ldan zla dkyil yar gyi ngo bzhin no //
K06D0013_H0017:214b-6: byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pas yi dvags 'gro ba gcod //
K06D0013_H0017:214b-7: dbul ba dang ni de bzhin nyon mongs thams cad gcod //
K06D0013_H0017:214b-8: spyod tshe longs spyod mtha' yas rgyas pa thob par 'gyur //
K06D0013_H0017:214b-9: sbyin pas sdug bsngal gyur ba'i sems can yongs smin byed //
K06D0013_H0017:214b-10: khrims kyis dud 'gro'i 'gro ba du ma'i ngo bo dang //
K06D0013_H0017:214b-11: mi kho ma brgyad spong de yis dal ba rtag tu rnyed //
K06D0013_H0017:214b-12: bzod pas gzugs bzang dam pa rgya chen thob 'gyur te //
K06D0013_H0017:214b-13: gser mdog sdug cing 'gro bas blta ba'i 'os su 'gyur //
K06D0013_H0017:214b-14: brtson 'grus kyis ni dkar po'i yon tan 'grib mi 'gyur //
K06D0013_H0017:214b-15: ye shes mtha' yas rgyal ba'i bang mdzod rnyed par 'gyur //
K06D0013_H0017:214b-16: bsam gtan gyis ni 'dod pa'i yon tan smad pa 'dor //
K06D0013_H0017:214b-17: rig dang mngon par shes dang ting 'dzin mngon par sgrub //
K06D0013_H0017:214b-18: shes rab kyis ni chos kyi rang bzhin yongs shes nas //
K06D0013_H0017:214b-19: khams gsum ma lus pa las yang dag 'da' bar 'gyur //
K06D0013_H0017:214b-20: mi yi khyu mchog 'khor lo rin chen bskor byas nas //
K06D0013_H0017:214b-21: sdug bsngal zad par bya phyir 'gro la chos kyang ston //
K06D0013_H0017:214b-22: chos 'di yongs rdzogs byas nas byang chub sems dpa' de //
K06D0013_H0017:215a-0: yongs dag zhing dang sems can dag pa yongs su @215a *//
K06D0013_H0017:215a-1: 'dzin; ;sangs rgyas rgyud dang chos kyi rgyud kyang yongs su 'dzin //
K06D0013_H0017:215a-2: de bzhin dge 'dun rgyud dang chos kun yongs su 'dzin //
K06D0013_H0017:215a-3: 'gro ba'i nad gso mdzad pa sman ba'i mchog gyur pas //
K06D0013_H0017:215a-4: shes rab bstan pa byang chub lam ldan 'di gsungs te //
K06D0013_H0017:215a-5: ming ni yon tan rin chen sdud pa byang chub lam //

K06D0013_H0017:215a-7: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sdud pa tshigs su bcad pa rdzogs so ////
